source/models/GenericMongoModel.js

GenericMongoModel

A Backbone.Model that represents a generic MongoDB object. All fields in the document are passed to the model as normal and a date attribute is set from the _id field of the mongo document pert_model = new GenericMongoModel()

Barista.Models.GenericMongoModel = Backbone.Model.extend({

initialize

Overides the base Model's initialize method to add the models date attribute and set the cid to the mongo _id field

initialize: function(attributes, options) { this.cid = this.get('_id') this.set("date", new Date(parseInt(this.cid.substring(0,8), 16)*1000)); } });
